Package org.terrier.querying.summarisation

Package for summarisation algorithms.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DefaultSummariser
    Summariser that was originally in the Decorate class, and formed the Terrier release from 3.0
    Summariser
    Base class for query biased summarisers.

Package org.terrier.querying.summarisation Description

Package for summarisation algorithms. Classes in this package are used to generate short summaries of documents, e.g. for snippet generation.
